missions.name: Let's Play! PS4 Booth
missions.description: Take a picture or selfie of yourself playing one of the PS4 games!

missions.name: Mash Up Movie Poster
missions.description: Name this new movie Mash up Poster

missions.name: Solve the Travellers Challenge!
missions.description: Travel at least one city and take 10 pictures in different areas

missions.name: Avengers Selfie
missions.description: Get a costume for any character from Avengers movie and take a selfie in it.

missions.name: Hike Time
missions.description: Check in on any hiking mountain at least 200 ft high

missions.name: Ludo Star
missions.description: Play Ludo Star game and win at-least 3 games. Share the winning pictures.

missions.name: Movie Night
missions.description: Watch any horror movie at nearby theater and check-in there

missions.name: Shopping Mall Spree
missions.description: Take at-least 10 images of things you buy at any shopping mall
